Full Color Printing

Corrugated Plastic Printing

Promote your business, event, or campaign with lightweight yet durable corrugated plastic signs from Be Seen Print, Sign, and Design. Our full-color, UV-printed signs are ideal for outdoor or temporary indoor use, and are fully customizable to match your branding.

Sign Options & Features

  • Printed on 4mm Corrugated Plastic
  • Weatherproof UV Inks
  • Optional Grommets or H-Stakes
  • Single or Double-sided Printing
  • Standard Sizes: 18"x24", 24"x36", or Custom
  • Perfect for Yard Signs, Promotions, Events

Download Design Guideline

Use our design template to ensure your files are sized correctly for printing. Contact us if you need help designing your sign!
